description: three +‎ score, compare the etymology of Danish tres

examples: And their brethren, heads of the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and threescore; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.  –  1611,  The Holy Bible, […] (King James Version), London:  […]  Robert Barker, […], →OCLC: 1 Chronicles 9:13
